channel.title: bbcnews TikTok
channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: One of the students, Yusuf, was trapped under the rubble for more than 24 hours. It is thought around 38 people are still stuck - and four students have died so far. #Indonesia #Java #Asia #WorldNews #BBCNews
item.description: One of the students, Yusuf, was trapped under the rubble for more than 24 hours. It is thought around 38 people are still stuck - and four students have died so far. #Indonesia #Java #Asia #WorldNews #BBCNews

item.title: Part of a 17-storey residential building in the Bronx area of New York has collapsed, in what the fire department is calling a "major emergency". #NYC #Bronx #USNews #BBCNews
item.description: Part of a 17-storey residential building in the Bronx area of New York has collapsed, in what the fire department is calling a "major emergency". #NYC #Bronx #USNews #BBCNews

item.title: Keir Starmer said he did not want to "tear down" human rights laws, but is willing to look into stopping unsuccessful asylum seekers blocking their deportation on the grounds they could be sent to worse prisons or healthcare systems. #KeirStarmer #UK #UKP

item.title: Secret BBC filming has exposed a hidden culture of misogyny and racism inside Met Police. After the BBC sent a detailed list of allegations to the Met, it suspended eight officers and one staff member, and took two more officers off front-line duties. #Po

item.title: The shutdown began on Wednesday after Republicans and Democrats in Congress failed to agree a new spending plan. Mass layoffs of federal workers will begin within two days, the White House has said. #US #Government #ShutDown #WhiteHouse #Republican #Democ

item.title: Israel's Foreign Ministry said several vessels that form part of the flotilla had been "safely stopped" and that those aboard, including Swedish activist Greta Thunberg, were being transferred to an Israeli port. #GretaThunberg #Flotilla #Israel #Navy #Bo
item.description: Israel's Foreign Ministry said several vessels that form part of the flotilla had been "safely stopped" and that those aboard, including Swedish activist Greta Thunberg, were being transferred to an Israeli port. #GretaThunberg #Flotilla #Israel #Navy #Bo

item.title: Four people have been injured in a car ramming and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester, UK. The suspect was shot by police. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #AndyBurnham #BreakingNews #BBCNews
item.description: Four people have been injured in a car ramming and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester, UK. The suspect was shot by police. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #AndyBurnham #BreakingNews #BBCNews

item.title: Four people have been injured and Greater Manchester Mayor Andy Burnham says the suspect is believed to be dead. The incident comes on Yom Kippur - the holiest day in the Jewish religious calendar. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #AndyBurnham #Breaki
item.description: Four people have been injured and Greater Manchester Mayor Andy Burnham says the suspect is believed to be dead. The incident comes on Yom Kippur - the holiest day in the Jewish religious calendar. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #AndyBurnham #Breaki

item.title: Greater Manchester Police have declared a major incident after four people were injured in a car and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester on Yom Kippur - the holiest day in the Jewish calendar. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #AndyBurnham #Cr
item.description: Greater Manchester Police have declared a major incident after four people were injured in a car and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester on Yom Kippur - the holiest day in the Jewish calendar. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #AndyBurnham #Cr

item.title: Keir Starmer said the attack happening on Yom Kippur makes it "all the more horrific". Four people have been injured, and the suspect has been shot by police. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #KeirStarmer #Emergency #BBCNews
item.description: Keir Starmer said the attack happening on Yom Kippur makes it "all the more horrific". Four people have been injured, and the suspect has been shot by police. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #KeirStarmer #Emergency #BBCNews

item.description: UK Prime Minister Keir Starmer has ended a trip to Denmark early to fly back to the UK and chair an emergency Cobra meeting in London. #Manchester #Crumpsall #KeirStarmer #Synagogue #GreaterManchesterPolice #AndyBurnham #News #BreakingNews #BBCNews

item.title: Greater Manchester Police said "three other members of the public remain in a serious condition" after the car and stabbing attack, which took place on Yom Kippur. #Manchester #GreaterManchesterPolice #KeirStarmer #Emergency #UK #BBCNews

item.title: Two people have died after a car and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester. The suspect is also believed to have been killed. #Manchester #Crumpsall #GreaterManchesterPolice #GMP #KeirStarmer #AndyBurnham #Synagogue #News #BBCNews
item.description: Two people have died after a car and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester. The suspect is also believed to have been killed. #Manchester #Crumpsall #GreaterManchesterPolice #GMP #KeirStarmer #AndyBurnham #Synagogue #News #BBCNews

item.title: Two people have died after a car and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester on Yom Kippur - the holiest day in the Jewish calendar. The suspect is believed to be dead after being shot by police. #Manchester #GreaterManchester #GreaterManchesterPolic
item.description: Two people have died after a car and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester on Yom Kippur - the holiest day in the Jewish calendar. The suspect is believed to be dead after being shot by police. #Manchester #GreaterManchester #GreaterManchesterPolic

item.title: Police have made two further arrests, counter-terrorism Policing Assistant Commissioner Laurence Taylor confirmed. #Manchester #Crumpsall #GreaterManchesterPolice #GMP #Synagogue #BreakingNews #News #BBCNews
item.description: Police have made two further arrests, counter-terrorism Policing Assistant Commissioner Laurence Taylor confirmed. #Manchester #Crumpsall #GreaterManchesterPolice #GMP #Synagogue #BreakingNews #News #BBCNews

item.title: Police also said the deadly attack on the synagogue in Manchester has been declared a terrorist incident. #Manchester #Crumpsall #GreaterManchesterPolice #GMP #Synagogue #BreakingNews #News #BBCNews
item.description: Police also said the deadly attack on the synagogue in Manchester has been declared a terrorist incident. #Manchester #Crumpsall #GreaterManchesterPolice #GMP #Synagogue #BreakingNews #News #BBCNews

item.title: Four people remain in hospital following a car and stabbing attack at a synagogue in Manchester, Greater Manchester Police Chief Constable Sir Stephen Watson has confirmed. #Manchester #Crumpsall #GreaterManchesterPolice #GMP #Synagogue #BreakingNews #New
